name: Suicidal Dolphin Simulator 3000
description:
Bob was born shaped like a gigantic floppy wiener, and ever since he has been the subject of mockeries from all around the ocean. Bob can't bear it anymore. Enough with this life of misery and living amongst the detritus of the sea. He is decided to end his life, and he needs your help : it's been harder and harder these days to kill yourself without a lifegard trying to save you.

Credits:

Anthony Kozak (exoa) - programmer

Shoy - naked old man modeler

dokMixer - Duck rubber-ring inflater
